short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes the comment section of a youtube video according to the themes that are discussed the most

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension is a unique tool designed specifically to analyze the comment section from videos of your favourite Youtube channels. Whether you want to grab a quick glance  of the most popular discussed topics or explore emerging trends based off the comments from your favourite creators, this extension can help provide you with a quick overview, which is especially useful for videos that contain thousands of comment threads.

Youtube Comments Insights also possesses a filter for the number of total comments you want to retrieve for a useful analysis which are given the percentage values of 50%, 75%, or 100%. Additionally to the most repeated words, the result from each analysis also identifies the most repeated bigrams, and trigrams which will provide a clear insight into the general themes being discussed within the comments section of the video you wanted to analyze. 

Have fun!
